variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.application]
| dedup appid
| fields appid
| append [data record(appid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.custom_application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.custom_application]
| dedup appid
| fields appid
| append [data record(appid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.application
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.mobile_application
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.custom_application
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.mobile_application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.mobile_application]
| dedup appid
| fields appid
| append [data record(appid="no data")]

16.content:
* Status : Green = Healthy
* Status : Red = Unhealthy (Problem)

34.title: Level 0
34.query:
fetch dt.entity.host | filter osType != "ZOS"
| lookup[
    fetch events
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(lookup.status),lookup.status, else: "游릭" )
| fieldsAdd event.id=lookup.event.id
| fields entity.name, id, status
| sort status
| append [
////////////////////
fetch dt.entity.service
| lookup[
    fetch events
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(lookup.status),lookup.status, else: "游릭" )
| fieldsAdd event.id=lookup.event.id
| fields entity.name, id, status
| sort status
]


///////////////////////
| append [

    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(lookup.status),lookup.status, else: "游릭" )
| fieldsAdd event.id=lookup.event.id
| fields entity.name, id, status
| sort status
]

|append[

    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id

fetch dt.entity.application

| sort status
| fieldsSummary status

37.title: Status
37.query:
fetch dt.entity.host | filter osType != "ZOS"
| lookup[ 
    fetch events
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(lookup.status),lookup.status, else: "游릭" )
| fieldsAdd event.id=lookup.event.id
| fields entity.name, id, status
| sort status
| limit toLong($top)

38.title: Host
38.query:
fetch dt.entity.host | filter osType != "ZOS"
| lookup [
    timeseries {cpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), mem=avg(dt.host.memory.usage)}, by:{dt.entity.host}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.host, $host)}
    | fields timeframe,interval, entityName(dt.entity.host), dt.entity.host,  cpu, mem
], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.host
| summarize {cpu.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.cpu)), cpu.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.cpu)),mem.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.mem)), mem.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.mem))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| lookup[
    fetch events
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(lookup.status),lookup.status, else: "游릭" )
| fieldsAdd event.id=lookup.event.id
| fields entity.name, id, status, cpu.avg, cpu.max, mem.max, mem.avg,`latest pb`=if(isNotNull(lookup.display_id),lookup.display_id, else : ""), event.id=lookup.event.id
| sort status, cpu.avg desc
| limit toLong($top)

41.title: Services
41.query:
fetch dt.entity.service
| lookup [
    timeseries {resp_time=avg(dt.service.request.response_time), failure=sum(dt.service.request.failure_count), count=sum(dt.service.request.count)}, by:{dt.entity.service}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.service, $service)}
    | fields timeframe,interval, entityName(dt.entity.service), dt.entity.service, resp_time, failure, count
], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.service
| summarize {resp_time = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.resp_time)), failure = sum(arraySum(lookup.failure)), count= sum(arraySum(lookup.count))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| lookup[
    fetch events
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(lookup.status),lookup.status, else: "游릭" )
| fieldsAdd event.id=lookup.event.id
| fields entity.name, id, status, resp_time, failure, count, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(lookup.display_id),lookup.display_id, else : ""), event.id=lookup.event.id
| sort status, count desc
| limit toLong($top)
